name: Patrick Carter
testimonial: Jack is a dedicated and intelligent member of the team who works harder than pretty much anyone I know. He thinks outside the box and finds solutions to problems that nobody else could. He is clearly an outstanding member of any team.

name: Michael Childs
testimonial: Jack is incredibly talented, his work ethic is fantanstic, his actual work is amazing and any company would be lucky to have him. Jack gets along very well with others and we are hopeful he will return to us one day.

name: Emma Rice
testimonial: Jack is a key team member at Leeds Student Radio. His technical ability is imperative in keeping our online radio station working. [...] I would therefore highly recommend Jack for any position. His intellect and character would be of benefit to any employer.

name: Becky Kusznir
testimonial: Jack is always the go to for any issue in the office, not only is he amazing at getting it fixed but he also takes the time to teach and explain. He's always one to rely on.

name: Jerry Iu
testimonial: I met Jack this year through Hack The North and we became great friends instantly because of his personality. [...] Not only did he teach me the process of creating a project from scratch to demo, he also taught me what's it like to be a great developer. His leadership skill is undoubtedly the best. [...]
